name: Easter Ham Bone Soup
author: Jennifer W
summary: Great way to use the Easter ham bone.
ingredients: 5  green onions, chopped, or more to taste
directions: Bring 3 quarts water and ham bone to a boil in a large stock pot
Boil until meat from the bone comes off easily, about 1 hour
Allow bone to cool enough to touch; remove as much meat from as possible
Transfer meat to a resealable plastic bag, seal, and refrigerate
Pour broth into a large bowl; cover and refrigerate overnight
Skim and discard any fat from the top of the chilled broth; transfer broth to a large pot
Bring broth to a boil; add potatoes, cabbage, celery, and reserved ham
Continue to simmer until potatoes are tender, about 45 minutes
Whisk 1/2 cup water and flour in a bowl; whisk into potato-ham soup until thickened
